panels.description: Torrents that had errors during the interval [10 minutes by default]

targets.query:
from(bucket: "transmission/transmission_exporter_retention")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "torrents" and r.error != "0" and r._field == "downloaded")
  |> group(columns: ["infohash", "client_name"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["client_name", "torrent_name", "tracker", "error", "_time"])
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "Last Error Time", client_name: "Client Name", torrent_name: "Torrent Name", tracker: "Tracker", error: "Error Code"})

panels.title: Torrents With Errors

panels.description:
The top 10 torrents by upload over the past 24 hours (aggregated from all clients)

Note: This is hard-coded past 1 day only! No dynamic ranges supported as to not accidentally kill DB for a call that is too demanding

targets.query:
preFilter = from(bucket: "transmission/transmission_exporter_retention")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "torrents" and r._field == "uploaded")
  |> group(columns: ["infohash", "client_name"])

firstVals = preFilter
  |> first()
  |> group(columns: ["infohash", "torrent_name", "tracker"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

lastVals = preFilter
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["infohash", "torrent_name", "tracker"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  
join(tables: {first: firstVals, last: lastVals}, on: ["infohash", "torrent_name", "tracker"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_last - r._value_first }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "torrent_name", "tracker"])
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Uploaded", torrent_name: "Torrent Name", tracker: "Tracker"})

panels.title: Top 10 Uploaded Torrents (Past Day)

panels.description: Free space remaining in download folder (all clients free space added together)

targets.query:
import "experimental"
from(bucket: "transmission/transmission_exporter_retention")
  |> range(start: experimental.subDuration(d: ${intervalOffset}s, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: experimental.addDuration(d: ${intervalOffset}s, to: v.timeRangeStop))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stats" and r._field == "free_space")
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: [])

panels.title: Free Space

panels.description: Total amount of data downloaded over all time

panels.title: All Time Total Uploaded

targets.query:
from(bucket: "transmission/transmission_exporter_retention")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stats" and r._field == "downloaded")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "client_name"])
  |> difference(columns: ["_value"], nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: [])

from(bucket: "transmission/transmission_exporter_retention")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

panels.description: Current upload speed of all torrent client(s) combined

targets.query:
import "experimental"
from(bucket: "transmission/transmission_exporter_retention")
  |> range(start: experimental.subDuration(d: ${intervalOffset}s, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: experimental.addDuration(d: ${intervalOffset}s, to: v.timeRangeStop))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stats" and r._field == "upload_speed")
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8}))
  |> group(columns: [])
